text: Jacques Pellen (1957 - 21 April 2020) was a French jazz guitarist. Pellen worked with many musicians over the years such as Peter Gritz, Kenny Wheeler, Bruno Nevez, Henri Texier, Riccardo Del Fra, and violinist Didier Lockwood. Pellen was born in Brest, France. Pellen died of COVID-19 on 21 April 2020, aged 63. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2020 deaths Category:1957 births Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in France Category:French guitarists Category:French jazz musicians Category:People from Brest, France
title: Jacques Pellen
